categories.description: Projects that are related to the care of the environment, sustainability, and/or biological diversity.
categories.name: Ecological

categories.description: Studies or research, projects that look for answers, solutions, new explanations.
categories.name: Scientific

sdgs.description: Clean, accessible water for all is an essential part of the world we want to live in.
sdgs.name: Clean Water and Sanitation

sdgs.description: Energy is central to nearly every major challenge and opportunity.
sdgs.name: Affordable and Clean Energy

sdgs.description: Climate change is a global challenge that affects everyone, everywhere.
sdgs.name: Climate Action

sdgs.description: Careful management of this essential global resource is a key feature of a sustainable future.
sdgs.name: Life Below Water

sdgs.description: Sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, halt and reverse land degradation, halt biodiversity loss
sdgs.name: Life On Land

categories.description: Projects that promote social change, resolve problems with or strengthen human relationshiops in order to achieve better well-being.
categories.name: Social

categories.description: Technical development of software, hardware, tools, etc in order to solve concrete problems or needs.
categories.name: Technological

categories.description: Projects that are business initiatives, and that hope to generate profits.
categories.name: Commercial

categories.description: Projects whose most important objective is formation or learning.
categories.name: Educational

categories.description: Projects with artistic or cultural objectives.
categories.name: Cultural

categories.description: Studies or research, projects that look for answers, solutions, new explanations.
categories.name: Scientific

sdgs.description: Economic growth must be inclusive to provide sustainable jobs and promote equality.
sdgs.name: No poverty

sdgs.description: The food and agriculture sector offers key solutions for development, and is central for hunger and poverty eradication.
sdgs.name: Zero Hunger

sdgs.description: Ensuring healthy lives and promoting the well-being for all at all ages is essential to sustainable development.
sdgs.name: Good Health and Well-Being

sdgs.description: Obtaining a quality education is the foundation to improving people’s lives and sustainable development.
sdgs.name: Quality Education

sdgs.description: Sustainable economic growth will require societies to create the conditions that allow people to have quality jobs.
sdgs.name: Decent Work and Economic Growth

sdgs.description: Investments in infrastructure are crucial to achieving sustainable development.
sdgs.name: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure

sdgs.description: To reduce inequalities, policies should be universal in principle, paying attention to the needs of disadvantaged and marginalized populations.
sdgs.name: Reduced Inequalities

sdgs.description: There needs to be a future in which cities provide opportunities for all, with access to basic services, energy, housing, transportation and more.
sdgs.name: Sustainable Cities and Communities

categories.description: Projects whose objective is to inform, denounce and/or communicate (for example, civic journalism, documentaries, blogs, radio programs).
categories.name: Communications

categories.description: Technical development of software, hardware, tools, etc in order to solve concrete problems or needs.
categories.name: Technological

categories.description: Projects with artistic or cultural objectives.
categories.name: Cultural

categories.description: Studies or research, projects that look for answers, solutions, new explanations.
categories.name: Scientific

sdgs.description: Gender equality is not only a fundamental human right, but a necessary foundation for a peaceful, prosperous and sustainable world.
sdgs.name: Gender Equality

sdgs.description: There needs to be a future in which cities provide opportunities for all, with access to basic services, energy, housing, transportation and more.
sdgs.name: Sustainable Cities and Communities

sdgs.description: Access to justice for all, and building effective, accountable institutions at all levels.
sdgs.name: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions

sdgs.description: Revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
sdgs.name: Partnerships for the Goals
